csgo taught me life. Life is fun, but you stumble upon Russians along the way. 10/10 Russians made it fun!

The game is nice. I like everything about it, i love the skins and i have a lot of fun playing for hours. Biggest problem is the community, a lot of cheater, toxic people including myself and russians on the euw server with more than 100ms hsing you before u can see them. 
All in all the game is great u will have a lot of fun rounds and some not so fun ones.

People call it a competitive game however there are very few guns you can actually ads with, you cannot prone either. For those who want to play a realistic strategic shooter, play siege. This game is more of a fast pase mess around type of shooter like cod.
I haven't played a shooter in about 10 years and reminded me of how much fun it is even if I die a lot but that will change as I get back up and head out for more.
